rot.title: ROT-N
rot.description:
The ROT-cipher, also commonly referred to as the Caesar-cipher, is based on the idea of ofsetting every letter of the alphabet by a certain amount, i.e. 
A => +13 => N
rot.outOfRangeWarning: ROT only supports letters of the basic alphabet (A-Z). Numbers and accented letters are not supported and will be copied as-is!

base64.title: Base64
base64.description: <wikipedia>Base64-encoding</wikipedia> is commonly used for storing arbitrary binary data in pure strings, by mapping it to 64 ASCII characters.

numberbase.title: Base Converter
numberbase.description: Convert between decimal, binary, octal and hexadecimal numbers.
numberbase.nanWarning: The input is not a valid number!

urlencode.title: URL-Encoding
urlencode.description: Encode and decode strings to and from <wikipedia>URL-encoding (or Percent-encoding)</wikipedia>.

linux_permissions.title: Linux File-Permissions
linux_permissions.description: Linux (or other UNIX-ish systems) use 4 groups of 3 bits to represent basic file permissions. The first group sets the flags set UID, set GID, and sticky. The last three groups set the file-permissions for the owner user, the owner group, and everyone else in that order. Here the 3 bits stand for read, write, and execute. On directories execute stands for open / navigate into.

ipv4subnetting.title: IPv4 Subnetter
ipv4subnetting.description: The IPv4 subnetter visualizes IPv4 subnets and calculates the first and last address from a CIDR-notated subnet.

error.isNaN: This needs to be a valid number!
error.tooSmall: This needs to be a positive number!
error.tooBig: This may not be bigger than 255!
error.tooBigSubnet: This may not be bigger than 32!

about.title: About Kevins Data-Toolbox
about.p1: Kevins Data-Toolbox is my collection of useful small tools. Feel free to look through them to see if there anything is of use to you!
about.p2: There will be more tools added over time as I create them, so check back regularly to learn about new tools!

toolException.title: The tool encountered a fatal error.
toolException.description: The tool encountered a fatal error and was unable to complete its task. Please retry.

settings.title: Settings
settings.offlineUnavailable: Offline-installation not available on your browser.
